Complete Your Profile Soho House is not responsible for any content you upload on your social accounts and link to through your profile. We can remove your social accounts at any time. I\'m in the drawing room or just email me at garrettdocs@gmail.com. I\'m on the patio; feel free to drop by for a drink if you\'re at the house.
Welcome to \nSoho House Bookings A {price} deposit will be taken per allocated seat. This deposit may be redeemed at the cinema bar. If you choose to cancel your seat(s), you will be refunded. If you have not been allocated seats you will not be charged. For full T&Cs, please see our FAQ page.

HouseBoardFragment Your digital magazine, sharing stories from members around the world Discover Member Stories
Our story began in London\'s Soho, and we now have Houses all around the world. Each one has its own identity, but our mission has always been the same: to create a home away from home for our members. Our Houses Our story began in London’s Soho and we now have Houses all around the world, from Miami and Mumbai, to LA and London. Each one has its own identity, but our mission has always been the same: to create a home away from home for our members. Discover our Houses around the world

Guest Invitations You\'ll need to send an invitation to your guest so they can join you at the House. Guests will need to create an account with us to accept the invitation – it takes about two minutes and is only needed once. Welcome to Soho House Hello {first name} Continue You now have full access to all the houses and the member benefits. Here\’s your digital membership card. You can use this to check into the houses and open tabs in our bars and restaurants. You now have full access to all the spaces at {the House} and take part in member events and experiences. You now have full access to all the houses and the member benefits. Here\’s your digital membership card. You can use this to check into the houses and open tabs in our bars and restaurants. Here\’s your membership card, use it to make bookings, access events and your benefits. You have changed the icon for “Soho House”. OK
Friends Member Cities Without Houses Member Connect Member None Member
Your member benefits Houses Access to Soho Houses around the world. The only exception is Little Beach House Malibu, which needs an additional Malibu Plus membership. You now have full access to all the spaces at {the House} and take part in member events and experiences. Events> Each House has a monthly events programme featuring everything from masterclasses and chef takeovers, to workshops and comedy nights Access to weekly curated events, from cocktail masterclasses with Soho House bartenders to sound baths Stay with us We have bedrooms, apartments, lofts and cabins in the city, on the coast and in the countryside that members can book at lower rates Soho Friends members can stay in our bedrooms across the world at a special rate Wellbeing Many Houses have Soho Active gyms with class schedules, pools and spas so you can recharge and reset Eat and drink Inside the Houses there are club spaces for eating, drinking and relaxing. You\'ll find simple dishes on our menus, made using seasonal and locally sourced ingredients. We have restaurants all over the world, from classic Italian to American diners. Receive 20% off on Sundays after 4pm, and all day Monday to Wednesday Browse cinema tickets Browse bedrooms View all benefits
Stay with us We have bedrooms, cabins, lofts and apartments in the city, by the beach and in the countryside, for short breaks and longer stays. Browse bedrooms
Electric Cinema New releases and classics A unique cinema experience in the heart of Portobello and in White City. Climatic places with the best films, tastiest food and comfiest seats. Explore Electric Cinema Show results By City Show the benefits more suited to your location Reset Refine Handpicked by our team %1$s (%2$s) Worldwide

Once you book a room, it will be displayed here "You need to save at least one payment method to book bedrooms. Please note, this card will not be used to process membership payments. " "You need to save at least one payment method to book bedrooms. Please note, this card will not be used to process membership payments. " "You need to save at least one payment method to book bedrooms. Please note, this card will not be used to process membership payments. "
Our houses are private places Our members’ privacy is very important, so please don\'t take photos in the Houses or bother anyone you don\'t know. Posting about the Houses or fellow members on social media is not allowed either. Keep it casual We\'re a members’ club for people working in the creative industries and we have a relaxed dress code. Please make sure your guests know this too. Look after your membership card Here’s your membership card. Use it to make bookings, access events and benefits. Phones and laptops Communal spaces in the Houses are phone call-free areas, so please keep your devices on silent. If you need to make a call, please do it quietly in the designated areas. Look out for laptop-free zones in some clubs. First come, first served There\'s generally no need to book, but if you\'re planning ahead we do take reservations. If you would like to eat with more than three guests, please book in advance. Guests are welcome Members can sign in up to three guests at any time. You\'re responsible for your guests’ behaviour, so please keep an eye on them and make sure they call it a night when you do. Children The Houses are designed for adults, but many are child friendly. Please be considerate when bringing in children. It\'s a good idea to ask each House about its rules as they can vary. Don\’t forget We don\’t offer credit at the Houses, so please pay your bill before you leave Stay with us Our bedrooms are now members-only. Soho Friends members can stay in our bedrooms across the world at a special rate Studio spaces for members Our studios are spaces for members to gather, collaborate and make More Member Benefits Discover benefits in your local area and further afield when travelling, from neighbourhood coffee shops to fitness boutiques.
Next Let me in Our studios are spaces for our members to gather, collaborate and make. Explore our spaces Studio spaces Reposition to make sure we can identify you in the profile photo you choose
